text: Ok, So I am using my dev environment to also code some email templates, but alas, it looks like free accounts AKA my dev sandbox account does allow for building email templates :disappointed:
I could use our production portal, but would love to keep a consistent workflow. Anything to do about this?
I guess i could set up a hs cli script to push straight to prod to test emails, but if there would be a way to enable email template dev in sandboxes, that would be nice :wink:
